body: Yep, it's me. The one and only Apollo that brings the Funk! Decided to come back to the community to see what has changed and catch up on some thing i missed. So ask away!
body_tagged: Yep, it's me. The one and only Apollo that brings the Funk! Decided to come back to the community to see what has changed and catch up on some thing i missed. So ask away!
title: [AMA] I'm Back!

replies.body:
HI APOLLO
You're really the only OCN person nice to me :/
Where have you been?
Where do you live?
Sunflowers or Roses?
Apollo Jolly or Apollo Funky?
Opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged:
HI APOLLO
You're really the only OCN person nice to me :/
Where have you been?
Where do you live?
Sunflowers or Roses?
Apollo Jolly or Apollo Funky?
Opinions on me?

replies.body:
:D
Well, i've been taking a "break" as what you can call it and doing a shit ton of work with my music and that was super tiring and i just kind of forgot about the community :/
Satellite Beach, Florida
Roses, got my girlfriend those for Valentines Day :)
Super freaking chill and really nice to talk to. All-in-all a great person :D
